column1: Smoque BBQ////I've been coming to Smoque for years
column3: and the last two times (this past Tuesday
column4: and about a month before that as well) it has really been off.  Someone else commented that the brisket has been "pot-roastey"
column5: and that's spot on.  This past Tuesday I ordered one pound of brisket
column6: and the majority of the slices were grey with little-to-no smoke ring.  The slices were also mushy and fatty
column7: with almost no smoke flavor...and the bark
